data.name: DelimitedNameNotAllSpecialChars
data.value: A delimited identifier must not consist entirely of special characters.

data.name: DelimitedNameStartingChar
data.value: Delimited name may not begin with backslash or dollar sign.

data.name: DoubledEmbeddedQuotes
data.value: Embedded double quotes in delimited name must be doubled.

data.name: EmbedDoubleQuotesInString
data.value: Embedded single quotes in {0} must be doubled.

data.name: EmbedStringInQuotes
data.value: The {0} must be enclosed in single quotes.

data.name: NameCanContainCharacters
data.value: The name may contain only letters, digits, and underscores.

data.name: NameNoReserverdWord
data.value: The name may not be a reserved word.

data.name: NameShouldBeginWithLetter
data.value: The name must begin with a letter.

data.name: NonBlankCharinDelimitedName
data.value: A delimited identifier must contain at least one non-blank character.

data.name: NoTrailingSpaceinDelimitedName
data.value: A delimited identifier may not contain trailing spaces.

data.name: ValidSpecialCharacters
data.value: Special characters are limited to blank and {0}.
